divs: sighting detailsmom, dad and i where sitting in the backyard, that night. it was a very clear night and there was no moon in the sky. we where watching the sky and we started to see some "moving stars". like those pale stars, moving around, erratically, not only in one direction, but going all directions. at first we thought to be a plane, but planes only moves in one direction and never stops. that was not the case, the "stars" moves around in every direction, sometimes getting "bigger" with orange\red\white lights and sometimes getting almost invisible, with pale white lights. all night long it happened and about 2:00 am we saw a huge orange lights formation, like an arrow, or a club, like those army planes fly in july 4. they where about 20 lights moving from east to west right over the house, no noise, if it was planes, noise will be heard because they looked to be low altitude. sorry for my bad english.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Taquara
This sighting has never been favorited.
